page.title: 16RANGERS DUTIES
page.content: A Ranger's duties are many and varied.Taking action on their weekly reports highlights the variety and range of duties undertaken.These include helping and advising visitors.building bridges,repairing the banks of a river washed out by floods,or mending stiles.If footpaths are not properly marked,then visitors wander across farmland disturbing lifestock and damaging crops.When the weather is fine and all is well,the Ranger's role is one of conversation,conservation,public relations,help and guidance.When emergencies arise,the Ranger becomes a moorland firefighter,mountain rescuer,snow clearer,sheep saviour or first aider.
